name: 4-Way Heroes
description:
A twist on an action RPG where you control the position of a party made of 4 distinct heroes.

An archer that shoots fast arrows.

A mage with devastating AOE fire magic.

A barbarian to deal with enemies in close combat.

A paladin with a repelling shield to defend yourself against enemy projectiles.

Each hero attacks automatically when an enemy is in range, so it's all about positioning and making the right hero face the right foe.

Gamepad is recommended.
